name: normalized_name
description: Deprecated: Lowercased field of study name. Use `name` instead.

name: level
description: Level of field in the four-level field taxonomy. Ranges from 0-4, in which level 0 is the highest level of aggregation and level 3 is the lowest. Only publications within selected level-0 and level-1 fields have level-2 or level-3 fields.

name: index
description: Field identifier used as an index during inference. Don't query this value; use `name` instead.
